posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
1885 Tony Mullane Cabinet Photo from his Personal Estate.  Beautiful Item with Provenance. SOLD

1871 Hand Colored Peck and Snyder Baseball Team Player Prints.  Produced by Roylance and Purcell and extremely rare.  Already sold one to the largest dealer in 19th century items.  Measure about 8X5.5 and some of the best looking pre-professional baseball collectibles around.

Red Stocking   $1100
Atlantics      $900
Star Club      $600
Mutuals        $750
Tony Pastor Club $400

(All blank backed Poster cut card with no black lettering)
